snippet.title: Knights of Valour – Launch Trailer | PS4
snippet.description:
ARCADE NEVER DIES! Experience side-scrolling, stage-based multiplayer action in Knights of Valour. Join the fight solo or with up to 3 other players to defeat a mighty evil. The Knights of Valour are awaiting you!

http://www.kov-game.com/

Copyright© (1999-2017) International Games System Corp.
